refnamediv.refpurpose: Assign the value of the given Csound variable to a Python variable possibly destroying its previous content.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Assign the value of the given Csound variable to a Python variable possibly destroying its previous content. The resulting Python object will be a float.
